text: "Since I Don't Have You" is a 1958 song by doo-wop group The Skyliners and went to number 12 in the United States. It went on to be covered by The Four Seasons, Don McLean and Ronnie Milsap for his 20th studio album Back to the Grindstone. ==Guns N' Roses version== In 1994, hard rock band Guns N' Roses covered "Since I Don't Have You" for their fifth studio album "The Spaghetti Incident?". It was their 18th single in their career. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom, number 69 in the United States, number 1 in Iceland, number 26 in Scotland, number 20 in Canada, number 47 in Australia, number 16 in Ireland and number 48 in New Zealand. title: Since I Don't Have You
